dependencies.description:
The NOAA bufr library contains subroutines, functions and other
utilities that can be used to read (decode) and write (encode) data in
BUFR, which is a WMO standard format for the exchange of meteorological
data. This is part of the NCEPLIBS project. The library also includes a
Python interface.
dependencies.name: bufr

dependencies.description: Cairo is a 2D graphics library with support for multiple output devices.
dependencies.name: cairo

dependencies.description:
The NVIDIA HPC SDK is a comprehensive suite of compilers, libraries and
tools essential to maximizing developer productivity and the performance
and portability of HPC applications. The NVIDIA HPC SDK C, C++, and
Fortran compilers support GPU acceleration of HPC modeling and
simulation applications with standard C++ and Fortran, OpenACC
directives, and CUDA. GPU-accelerated math libraries maximize
performance on common HPC algorithms, and optimized communications
libraries enable standards-based multi-GPU and scalable systems
programming. Performance profiling and debugging tools simplify porting
and optimization of HPC applications.
dependencies.name: cxx

dependencies.description:
The NVIDIA HPC SDK is a comprehensive suite of compilers, libraries and
tools essential to maximizing developer productivity and the performance
and portability of HPC applications. The NVIDIA HPC SDK C, C++, and
Fortran compilers support GPU acceleration of HPC modeling and
simulation applications with standard C++ and Fortran, OpenACC
directives, and CUDA. GPU-accelerated math libraries maximize
performance on common HPC algorithms, and optimized communications
libraries enable standards-based multi-GPU and scalable systems
programming. Performance profiling and debugging tools simplify porting
and optimization of HPC applications.
dependencies.name: fortran

dependencies.description:
FreeType is a freely available software library to render fonts. It is
written in C, designed to be small, efficient, highly customizable, and
portable while capable of producing high-quality output (glyph images)
of most vector and bitmap font formats.
dependencies.name: freetype

dependencies.description:
This library contains C decoder/encoder routines for GRIB edition 2.
This is part of NOAA's NCEPLIBS project.
dependencies.name: g2c

dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.
dependencies.name: gmake

dependencies.description:
The GNU config.guess and config.sub scripts versioned by timestamp.
This package can be used as a build dependency for autotools packages
that ship a tarball with outdated config.guess and config.sub files.
dependencies.name: gnuconfig

dependencies.description:
The GNU Scientific Library (GSL) is a numerical library for C and C++
programmers. It is free software under the GNU General Public License.
The library provides a wide range of mathematical routines such as
random number generators, special functions and least-squares fitting.
There are over 1000 functions in total with an extensive test suite.
dependencies.name: gsl

dependencies.description:
HDF4 (also known as HDF) is a library and multi-object file format for
storing and managing data between machines.
dependencies.name: hdf

dependencies.description:
HDF-EOS (Hierarchical Data Format - Earth Observing System) is a self-
describing file format based upon HDF for standard data products that
are derived from EOS missions. HDF-EOS2 is based upon HDF4.
dependencies.name: hdf-eos2

dependencies.description:
NetCDF (network Common Data Form) is a set of software libraries and
machine-independent data formats that support the creation, access, and
sharing of array-oriented scientific data. This is the C distribution.
dependencies.name: netcdf-c

dependencies.description:
NetCDF (network Common Data Form) is a set of software libraries and
machine-independent data formats that support the creation, access, and
sharing of array-oriented scientific data. This is the C++ distribution.
dependencies.name: netcdf-cxx4

dependencies.description:
PROJ is a generic coordinate transformation software, that transforms
geospatial coordinates from one coordinate reference system (CRS) to
another. This includes cartographic projections as well as geodetic
transformations.
dependencies.name: proj

dependencies.description: Python interface to the netCDF Library.
dependencies.name: py-netcdf4

dependencies.description: Fundamental package for array computing in Python.
dependencies.name: py-numpy

dependencies.description:
pandas is a fast, powerful, flexible and easy to use open source data
analysis and manipulation tool, built on top of the Python programming
language.
dependencies.name: py-pandas

dependencies.description: N-D labeled arrays and datasets in Python
dependencies.name: py-xarray

dependencies.description: The Python programming language.
dependencies.name: python

dependencies.description: zlib replacement with optimizations for next generation systems.
dependencies.name: zlib-api

dependent_to.description:
METplus is a verification framework that spans a wide range of temporal
(warn-on-forecast to climate) and spatial (storm to global) scales.
dependent_to.name: metplus

description:
Statistical tool that matches up grids with either gridded analyses or
point observations and applies configurable methods to compute
statistics and diagnostics
name: met

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system

variants.description: Enable compilation of utilities using GRIB2
variants.name: grib2
